info.author: xman40100
info.name: native_phonecalls
info.description: A resource mimicks a dialogue system like in singleplayer.

setting.name: call_timeout
setting.desc: The amount of time in which the player's phone will be ringing until the phone call times out. Default: 15 seconds.

setting.name: call_answerkey
setting.desc: The key that allows players to answer a phone call. Default: TAB.
